Major_Arcs.title: King Guz and the Debt
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around King Guz's rescue and Alley's attempt to collect an old debt, setting up a humorous conflict.

sub_scenes.title: The Rescue and Immediate Debt Collection
sub_scenes.description: King Guz is rescued from drowning by Alley, who immediately brings up an unpaid debt, much to the woman's surprise.

narrative_arcs.title: King Guz's Wet Predicament and Unpaid Debt

Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Trade-In Saga
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Alley's decision to trade in his old dinosaur Dinny for a newer model, leading him through a dealership experience.

sub_scenes.title: The Clumsy Dinosaur and Trade-In Idea
sub_scenes.description: Alley's dinosaur Dinny's clumsiness prompts the idea of trading him in for a newer model.

sub_scenes.title: Honest Zog's Dealership Visit
sub_scenes.description: Alley and a companion visit Honest Zog's dealership and browse for a new dinosaur.

sub_scenes.title: Test Drive and Dino Bite Deal Closer
sub_scenes.description: Alley test drives a compact dinosaur, which seals the deal despite an unexpected biting incident.

narrative_arcs.title: Deal Sealed and Zog's Dino's Bite

sub_scenes.title: Farewell to Dinny and Departure
sub_scenes.description: Alley bids a sad farewell to Dinny and departs with the new dinosaur, receiving advice from Zog.

narrative_arcs.title: Alley's Farewell and Mixed Feelings about Dinny
Departure with New Dino & Zog's Advice

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Unruly Afterlife at the Dealership
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Dinny's experiences after being traded in, including appraisal, a wild test ride, and his defiant roar.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Appraisal and Chaotic Test Ride
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is appraised by potential buyers and then given a test ride which turns chaotic, revealing his unruly nature.

narrative_arcs.title: Unexpectedly Wild Test Ride on Dinny

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Past Abuse and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Dinny's past mistreatment is revealed, leading to Alley's decision to rescue him and bring him back home.

Major_Arcs.title: Alley and Coola's Interpersonal Spat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details a conflict between Alley and Coola stemming from a fishing invitation and escalating into a physical altercation.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Rejection and Accusation
sub_scenes.description: Coola rejects Alley's fishing invitation, leading to accusations and a heated argument.

Major_Arcs.title: Misogynistic Cavemen and Fishing Follies
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a series of humorous and somewhat misogynistic vignettes related to cavemen's views on women and fishing etiquette.

sub_scenes.title: Misogynistic Musings and Noisy Fishing
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen express stereotypical views about women and fishing etiquette, highlighting their frustrations.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusations and Apology by the Riverbank

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Suspicions and Discovery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores themes of romantic jealousy and suspicion, leading to an investigation and a surprising discovery.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Competition Accusation and Investigation
sub_scenes.description: A caveman is accused of romantic competition, prompting a reluctant investigation to verify the claims.

Major_Arcs.title: Misdirected Violence and Romantic Clarification
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features a violent outburst based on mistaken identity in a romantic context, leading to clarification and a tender moment.

sub_scenes.title: Violent Accusation and Tender Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: A caveman's violent accusation of romantic betrayal is misdirected, leading to a tender moment between the actual couple.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Advice and Sabotage
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores different approaches to romance, from gentle advice to clumsy sabotage attempts in a competitive love scenario.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Strategy and Mentoring
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen discuss romantic strategies, with one advising romance over violence and another mentoring in romantic techniques.

sub_scenes.title: Failed Sabotage and Public Rejection
sub_scenes.description: A jealous caveman's sabotage attempt to disrupt Koko's romance fails, leading to public humiliation.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Chaos and Misunderstandings
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc showcases various romantic mishaps and misunderstandings, from accusations of theft and cannibalism to infidelity and romantic reformations.

sub_scenes.title: Accusations and Romantic Declarations
sub_scenes.description: Romantic entanglements lead to accusations of theft, romantic interludes, and misunderstandings about cannibalism.

narrative_arcs.title: Romantic Interlude and Loss of Control
Clarification of Affection and Misunderstood Kiss

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity, Remorse, and Polite Courtship
sub_scenes.description: Scenes of infidelity, violent retribution, remorse, romantic reformation, and polite courtship depict diverse relationship dynamics.

narrative_arcs.title: Male Camaraderie and Complaint about Women

Major_Arcs.title: The New Twist Dance Craze and its Aftermath
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc satirizes a dance craze, 'The New Twist,' showing its social effects, injuries, and eventual disastrous consequences.

sub_scenes.title: The Twitch Injuries and Social Pressure
sub_scenes.description: The 'New Twist' dance causes injuries and social pressure to participate, highlighting its widespread impact.

narrative_arcs.title: The Unfortunate Consequences of the New Twist
Encouragement and Dismissal of the New Twist
Social Pressure to Participate in the Twitch Party

sub_scenes.title: Learning the Twitch and its Disastrous Outcome
sub_scenes.description: Characters attempt to learn 'The Twitch', leading to painful lessons and ultimately a disastrous public performance.

narrative_arcs.title: Post-Twitch Inquiry and Admission of Failure
Fleeing in Fear and Public Humiliation
Hospital Quiet and Watching the Aftermath

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel for Historical Research
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows a scholarly pursuit of historical information using time travel, leading to unexpected romantic observations.

sub_scenes.title: Scholarly Inquiry and Time Travel Setup
sub_scenes.description: Scholars discuss 16th-century Spain, leading to the idea of using time travel to gather firsthand information.

narrative_arcs.title: Scholarly Inquiry and Time Travel Suggestion

sub_scenes.title: Accidental Time Travel Kiss and Lab Arrival
sub_scenes.description: A romantic moment in ancient Spain leads to accidental time travel to the present during a kiss.

narrative_arcs.title: Time Traveler's Successful Tuning and Observation
Romantic Kiss Interruption and Time Travel Activation
Time Travel and Accidental Kiss in the Present

sub_scenes.title: Lab Confusion and Spain Assignment Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Confusion and humor ensue in the lab as the time traveler clarifies his Spain assignment and sends someone back to the past.

narrative_arcs.title: Confused in the Present Time Lab
Reassurance and Impending Return to Spain

Major_Arcs.title: Caveman's Spanish Misadventures
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a caveman's arrival in Spain and his comical misinterpretations of Spanish culture, leading to a series of chaotic events.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival and Street Serenade Intervention
sub_scenes.description: A caveman arrives in Spain and misinterprets a street serenade as a disturbance, deciding to intervene.

narrative_arcs.title: The Famous Don and the Disturbance

sub_scenes.title: Don Jose's Siesta and Bullfight Plan
sub_scenes.description: The reason for the commotion is revealed to be the disturbance of Don Jose's siesta, leading to a bullfight planning.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting the Stage for an Unconventional Bullfight

Major_Arcs.title: Alley's Second Time Travel Mishap
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Alley's second time travel experience, marked by a sarcastic welcome, a 'BZAP!' incident, and a kiss denied due to jealousy.

sub_scenes.title: Alley's Return and Kiss Denial
sub_scenes.description: Alley returns from time travel to a sarcastic welcome and is denied a promised kiss due to a jealous misunderstanding.

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day Fiasco
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously explores the concept of 'King for a Day,' showing the temporary king's immediate rejection and the original king's manipulative plan.

sub_scenes.title: Temporary King Appointment and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: A caveman is appointed temporary king but immediately faces rejection and ridicule from the villagers.

narrative_arcs.title: Debate on the King's Easy Life

Major_Arcs.title: Guz's Temporary Kingship Trials
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Guz's humorous and uncomfortable experience as a temporary king, facing Oompa's harsh treatment.

sub_scenes.title: Bon-Bon Mishap and Broom Attack
sub_scenes.description: Guz's attempt at leisure as temporary king is disrupted by Oompa, who attacks him for dirty feet.

narrative_arcs.title: Guz's Lazy Indulgence and Bon-Bon Mishap
Broom Attack and Temporary King Plea

Major_Arcs.title: Clam Dispute and Lost Fortune
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a humorous dispute over found clams, escalating into a fight and ultimately resulting in the loss of the clams.

sub_scenes.title: Clam Fight and Loss
sub_scenes.description: Characters fight over found clams, seeking wise counsel, only to find the clams have disappeared.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusations of Cheating and Fighting Over Money
Seeking Wise Counsel and Loss of Clams

Major_Arcs.title: Kingly Life and Disturbances
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc offers a glimpse into the chaotic life of a king-like figure, dealing with disturbances, corrupt advisors, lavish meals, and food fights.

sub_scenes.title: King's Day and Wise Guy's Beating
sub_scenes.description: A king-like figure deals with disturbances and witnesses the recurring beating of a 'Wise Guy'.

narrative_arcs.title: Investigating the Racket and the Wise Guy's Beating
Fine Advisor's Meal and Self-Serving Thoughts
Ulcer, Parsley, and Violence at Mealtime
narrative_arcs.description: The king's mealtime is disrupted by health concerns and sudden violence from a disgruntled servant.

Major_Arcs.title: Royalty, Apologies, and Ruler Proposition
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents contrasting scenarios of royalty: one of sincere apology and another of liberation from royal duties, culminating in a ruler proposition.

sub_scenes.title: Royal Apology and Liberation
sub_scenes.description: A crowned female caveman apologizes for an injury, and a muscular caveman expresses relief at leaving royal service.

Major_Arcs.title: Barberous Act
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc is a self-contained humorous story about a barber's unconventional methods to attract customers, driven by a prophecy.

sub_scenes.title: Prophecy and Barber's Customer Acquisition
sub_scenes.description: A prophecy leads a barber to forcibly 'acquire' customers for his shop in a humorous twist.

narrative_arcs.title: The Barberous Act and the Bearded Stranger

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Experiment Gone Awry (Sort Of)
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a time machine experiment that results in an unexpected visitor from the past and a minor malfunction, humorously resolved.

sub_scenes.title: Roman Soldier Arrival and Machine Fix
sub_scenes.description: A time machine experiment brings a Roman soldier to the present, causing surprise and a minor machine malfunction.

narrative_arcs.title: Time Machine Experiment and Unexpected Visitor
